features: 【Less Oil and Healthy Diet】Kitchen in the box counter-top convection toaster ovens adopts surround 360° air convection technology, convection fan help increases air flow circulation more faster, locks in moisture, avoid food scorching due to uneven heating. Which up to 75% less fat and grease compared with traditional frying method, but you can get same crisp and delicious taste food.

【18 Preset Functions and Advanced Dual Function】Kitchen in the box air fryer toaster oven combo can fulfill air fry, bake, roast, broil, toast, dehydrate, rotisserie, defrost, warm, proof, and so on, one machines can meet all your cooking needs, great space saver. Meanwhile the innovative dual cook function enables you to combine any two functions in preset. Make Complex recipes effortless and rich the dish's flavor.

【32QT Extra-Large Capacity and 6 Accessories】This conection toaster oven has a large interior capacity, which fits 13-inch pizaa, 9 slice toast, 6lbs rotisserie chicken and whole turkey, 6 accessories can meet all your cooking needs. It's perfect for whole family party.

【Powerful, Fast and Save Time】AUMATE Kitchen in the box toaster ovens countertop with 6 heat elements, 1800 watt in total, meanwhile double glass door heat reduces heat loss effectively, this will reduce cooking time greatly.

【Precise Temperature Control & Crispy Taste】This convection oven built in smart chips and temp sensors, which work together to control temperature and eliminate cold spots, the temperature error is within 5°F.
body.description: Kitchen in the box 1800W Air Fryer Toaster Oven Aumate is a Texas-based brand with a manufacturing base in Hong Kong. By combining American originality with superior Chinese production methods, we are able to keep our quality high and our prices low. 18 functions: Air fry, chips, wings, pizza, steak, cookies, snacks, veggies, bake, bagel, roast, broil, toast, dehydrate, defrost, warm, proof, reheat. Healthier with less oil: Cooking food with less oil, but with a crisper texture and more intense flavour. Convection Fan: Adopting the new technology of 360° constant hot air circulation, it greatly avoids food scorching caused by uneven heating. Faster Cooking: The 1800 Watts air fryer saves you time by cooking food faster. Precise temperature control: The temperature can be adjusted every 5°F to avoid burning food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Trying to cook for a family in a tiny 15QT air fryer was just not it so we wanted something bigger. Well we got bigger for sure! It’s massive, definitely not for people with a small kitchen! I’m in love though. I used my old air fryer almost every day for 7 years and I can already tell I’m going to use this one way more. It has so many functions it’s crazy. I cooked up some corn dogs for the kids and in 12 minutes flat from frozen we had hot crispy dogs, no flipping, my oven doesn’t even heat up that fast and my old air fryer would have taken a few extra minutes and needed to be flipped. Tonight we’re going to cook a frozen pizza since this thing is massive enough to fit one.So far I'm extremely happy with this purchase! Feels well made and works very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Convenient, Works well, easy to use with great results. Well worth it. Use it regularly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great oven with multiple cooking options
reviews.reviewText: Cooks very well and every function we have tried works perfectly. Air fryer and baking functions work exactly as they should and food turned out as expected. Not a small counter-top appliance but not too big as to be unwieldy either. For all the operations you get in one unit this is a very good buy. Took off one star as controls could be better and the back of the unit gets very hot (some additional shielding would help here).Note that there are several models on the Amazon site that look similar with similar functions. That is because these are all made in China in the same factory and just get different brand names slapped on them. So buy the one at the current cheapest discounted price and you'll save some money.And a question, why were there so many Vine free product reviews for this? Seemed like an abnormal number of these reviews, just kind of odd.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item to add to the kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I will say it took a few minutes to figure out the menu's and how to set the chosen function temp and time. After working out the menu's this works great! Cooked two 1.25lb game hens perfectly! Common sense says don't crowd this device the back has an exhaust fan and gets hot. Unable to post a picture it won't let me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product with so many features and the price was great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functions and product quality
reviews.reviewText: I've been waiting and shopping for this combo. Not disappointed! I wasn't sure on the brand- read the reviews and bought it. Put a watch on it and grabbed on sale! Took a little time learning the functions (of course more than a regular air fryer). Booklet explains clearly and all functions work great. I kept an eye on initially cooking things, some cook a smidge sooner, but not at all bad. Just need to get familiar. Totally recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better ovens are available in this price range.
reviews.reviewText: The on off button does not illuminate. The instrument panel does not shut off automatically when the oven has finished cooking it has to be shut off manually. The temperature and time settings are not convenient to set. The different cooking options are not convenient to set. The oven cooks ok, but I'm not impressed with the way options are set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this 32 QT Digital Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo, Kitchen in the box Convection Oven as we live in a tiny home with no stove/oven and I needed something to fit our space but big enough that it could feed 6 people.Upon receiving it I was very pleased with the size. I had a 6lb chicken I planned cooking with the rotisserie option, however it was slightly too big. If I had had some butcher twine I could have tied the legs and wing up tight and likely been able to use it, but I had run out. I decided to try the roasting pan and roast the chicken instead. Let me tell you it turned out AMAZING. My family went on and on about how good it was! I am looking forward to trying the rotisserie too once I get more twine.I haven't yet used it for anything else but I can't wait to do so! I also like that it has a dual cook option. What this means is that when I make a casserole, I can set it up to bake it and broil it to brown the top all in one go! I have to say, I am super pleased with it so far.The functions take some getting used to as it's only partially touch screen, but I know the more I use it the easier it will get.
